name: Alliumite
description: The Alliumite is a small, stealthy plant creature that excels in camouflage and ambush tactics, utilizing its distinctive Tearful Stench ability to incapacitate foes.
memorable: Its ability to blend into plant life makes it a rare sight, while its Tearful Stench can turn the tide of battle by blinding nearby enemies.
goals: To ambush and incapacitate enemies while remaining hidden in natural environments.
relations: Often found in conjunction with other plant creatures or in forested areas.
environment: Typically located in forests or overgrown terrains where it can use its camouflage.
strengths: Exceptionally skilled in stealth and ambush tactics, with potent area denial through its Tearful Stench ability.
weaknesses: Low strength and charisma make it vulnerable in direct confrontations and social interactions.
attacks: Uses Thorn Dart for ranged attacks and Grass Blade for melee, both with considerable accuracy.
most_powerful_ability: Tearful Stench can blind nearby creatures and control the battlefield during combat.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet and a passive perception of 13, aiding its stealthy nature.
skills: Proficient in stealth, allowing it to evade detection effectively.
additional_information: Plant Camouflage grants advantage on Stealth checks in foliage.
Strong dexterity makes it highly maneuverable.
Uses burrowing ability to escape or reposition.
Can incapacitate multiple foes within close proximity using its stench.
Resilient for its size, making it a surprisingly difficult foe to defeat.
